subject: Career
title: The Regret Minimization Framework
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Regret Minimization Framework.

hook.text: Jeff Bezos asked: 'At 80, will I regret not trying this?' He quit finance to start Amazon.

buildup.text: The regret minimization framework: project yourself to old age and look back at your choices.

discovery.text: Bronnie Ware's research on the dying found the #1 regret: 'I wish I'd had the courage to live true to myself.'

twist.text: People rarely regret things they tried, even if they failed. They regret the paths they never took.

climax.text: When deciding on a transition, ask: 'Which choice will I regret NOT making in 20 years?'

punchline.text: Minimize future regret. That's the compass.

quiz.question: What was the #1 regret of the dying according to Bronnie Ware's research?
options: Not having the courage to live true to themselves
